Package gui

Class Gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Gui

  • public class Gui
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI object that opens a shell and displays all necessary composites. Also updates all tables, etc with the ArchitectureFunctions lists.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Gui.MessageType
      The types of message boxes.

      Gui​()
      The constructor of the GUI that initializes the shell and its content, displays the GUI and also contains the program loop.
